title: Ticket #2543: Failed job start causes starter to shutdown w/o completing exit hook
description: If the starter has a problem running the executable for the job, it will perform a shutdown fast. Part of this process invokes the exit hook as it should, but it shuts down without waiting for the exit hook to exit. Anything using the job hooks that runs into this case will likely not be notified the job has exited and been evicted. This could mean a job that is injected with the hooks (fetch hook) will lose track of what has happened to the job.
